import React, {Component} from 'react' import { Typography, Tabs, Tab, Box, Paper, TextField, Grid, Button} from "@material-ui/core" import { AddCircleSharp, CreateSharp, SearchSharp, DeleteSharp } from "@material-ui/icons" class Item extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { item: {title : "", userid : "", type : "", sale : ""} , value : 0}; } handleChange = (event, newValue) => { this.setState({ value: newValue }); } a11yProps = (index) => { return { id: `simple-tab-${index}`, 'aria-controls': `simple-tabpanel-${index}`, }; } render() { return ( } {...this.a11yProps(0)} /> } {...this.a11yProps(1)} /> } {...this.a11yProps(2)} /> } {...this.a11yProps(2)} />


















); } } class TabPanel extends Component { render() { return ( {this.props.children} ); } } export default Item;
